item.description:
"What is Energy?  How do we feel it? How is the energy between me & my partner? Can we have a better sex life?  Love each other more?"  ~ Questions many of us have

 

 

 

There’s an energetic dynamic between couples (and all people actually) that significantly impacts the way they relate to each other. 

Understanding the Energetics of Intimacy can help you shift places that are stuck between you and help both of you open up to a deeper love and connection that may not have been possible otherwise. 

This revolutionary workshop is for you if:

• You’re in relationship and ready for the skills to deepen your connection 
• You’re interested in a better, more fulfilling sex life 
• You feel stuck in patterns in relationship and are ready to move them out of the way 
• You are a therapist, coach, bodyworker, energy healer, other professional that works with couples (and the information is even helpful when applied to therapist/client dynamic)

 

In this workshop you will learn:


• Different styles of relating energetically (and figure out which one is dominant in you) 

• Specific techniques to practice with your partner (or teach your clients) to support them in their ability to connect from a more deeply centered place 

• How to create energetic boundaries for yourself while working with your clients (this skill will stop fatigue, over involvement, the desire to "fix", and eliminate anxiety) 

• Powerful exercises that will open up your sensitivity to the energetics of intimacy that are in the room

 

We will play with: 

-- Energy and what it is, how do we feel it? 
-- Practical intimacy – tools and techniques 
-- Meditation and guided visualization 
-- Coaching/supervision, if time allows


Contribution -- $136 per person

To register please pay via PayPal (pushana@gmail.com) or email me and I'll let you know where to send a check.   You must reserve your spot in this workshop ahead of time.  There's limited space and only room for 20 participants.
item.name: The Energetics of Intimacy
